entry.name: Morton's Steak House
entry.text: Located in Toronto's trendy Yorkville at the Park Hyatt Hotel, Morton's the Steakhouse offers a classic dining experience. Welcoming decor, succulent steaks and fresh fish and seafood make Morton's a destination for Torontonians, celebrities and tourists alike. Whether you are looking for the perfect place to unwind with cocktails and Bar Bites or to book a private boardroom for a special occasion, Morton's offers impeccable service and a timeless menu.
entry.address:
4 Avenue Road at Prince Arthur
Toronto, Canada
